Table 3. Age-adjusted and unadjusted rates of violent victimization for persons with disabilities, by type of crime, 2009–2012

Note: Based on the noninstitutionalized U.S. residential population age 12 or older. Estimates were based on 2-year rolling averages. Rates were adjusted using direct standardization with the 2000 U.S. Standard Population. See Methodology. See appendix table 3 for standard errors.
Sources: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2008–2012; and U.S. Census Bureau, 2000 Standard Population and the American Community Survey, 2008–2012.
